sentences.en: Dewdrops sparkle [ glisten ] in the morning sun.
sentences.cn: 露珠在晨光下闪闪发光.

sentences.en: Dewdrops sparkle in the morning sun.
sentences.cn: 露珠在早晨的阳光下闪着光.

sentences.en: From far away, we saw the sparkle of a campfire.
sentences.cn: 我们从远处看到营火在闪耀.

sentences.en: Her voice had the sparkle of a mountain stream.
sentences.cn: 她茑语呖呖,像高山流水.

sentences.en: I want all to sparkle and dance in a glorious jubilee.
sentences.cn: 我要一切在灿烂的欢欣中闪耀飞舞.

sentences.en: In the marina yachts sparkle in the sunshine.
sentences.cn: 码头上游艇在阳光下闪闪发光。

sentences.en: The color of the flowers gave a sparkle to the smoky air.
sentences.cn: 色彩缤纷的鲜花,在烟雾弥漫的空气里,显得分外赏心悦目.
那水晶枝形吊灯闪闪发光。

sentences.en: The diomands don't sparkle like those you see on a ring.
sentences.cn: 钻石并不象你在戒指上见到的那么光耀夺目.

sentences.en: The film on show does not have much sparkle on it.
sentences.cn: 正放映的那部电影沈闷无生气.

sentences.en: The film on show doesn't have much sparkle on it.
sentences.cn: 正放映的那部电影沉闷无生气.

sentences.en: The sea sparkled in the sun.
There was a sparkle in her eye that could not be hidden.
sentences.cn: 她眼中闪烁着一丝无法掩藏的亮光。

sentences.en: There was a sudden sparkle as her diamond ring caught the light.
sentences.cn: 当她的钻石戒指遇到光时,有阵突然的闪耀.

sentences.en: There was little sparkle in their performance.
These prosaic details take all the sparkle out of the conversation.
sentences.cn: 这些无聊的细节使谈话失去了生气.

sentences.en: They looked at the sparkle of litlle dancing waves in the sunlight.
sentences.cn: 他们望着阳光下起伏小浪上的闪光.

words.tran_cn: 闪闪发光的，闪烁的；起泡沫的
电火花器；点火线圈；[海洋] 电火花震源；火花捕捉器
钻石；烟火；才华焕发的人；炯炯有神的眼睛
闪耀；发出火花；起泡沫（sparkle的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: a bright shiny appearance, with small points of flashing light

trans.tran_cn: 发火花, (使)闪耀, (香槟酒等)发泡, 用眼神表达, 发光闪烁
trans.tran_en: to shine in small bright flashes

trans.tran_cn: 闪耀，闪烁，活跃，焕发活力和才智
trans.tran_en: to shine in small bright flashes
